query: SELECT user_id, email FROM snowflake.db.users WHERE active = true
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_active_users AS SELECT user_id, email, last_login FROM snowflake.db.users WHERE active = true AND last_login > '2021-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) as active_count FROM temp_active_users
INSERT INTO snowflake.db.user_summary SELECT user_id, 'active' as status, NOW() as updated_at FROM temp_active_users
CREATE TABLE tmp_daily_metrics AS SELECT DATE(created_at) as date, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as unique_users FROM snowflake.db.sessions GROUP BY DATE(created_at)
SELECT * FROM tmp_daily_metrics WHERE unique_users > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
UPDATE snowflake.db.users SET last_seen = NOW() WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM temp_active_users)
